name: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Randy James HOUCK, Respondent

parties: COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Randy James HOUCK, Respondent.

opinions.text:
ORDER
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 19th day of September, 2007, the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is GRANTED. The issue is set forth below and is rephrased for clarity:
(1) Whether the Superior Court erred in concluding that Defendant was entitled to re-sentencing based on the fact that, during the jury waiver colloquy, the trial court recited a maximum possible sentence that was less than the sentence actually imposed?
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
933 A.2d 648
COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, Petitioner, v. Randy James HOUCK, Respondent.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Sept. 19, 2007.
